title: Atmospheric emissions: other pollutants by industry and gas
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: The emissions of PM10, PM2.5, carbon monoxide, non-methane volatile organic compound, Benzene and 1,3-Butadiene, by industry (SIC 2007 group - around 130 categories), UK, 1990 to 2019 and (provisional) 2020.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest version.
sizingNotes: Simple table structure and dimensions with some footnotes.
notes: Priority dataset for Climate Change Platform project.
